verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> as touching <S%G4012><s%> things offered unto idols <S%G1494><s%>, we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>. Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> puffs up <S%G5448><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> love <S%G26><s%> edifies <S%G3618><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> that he knows <S%G1492><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%>, he knows <S%G1097><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he ought <S%G1163><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> loves <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the same <S%G3778><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

As concerning <S%G4012><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the eating <S%G1035><s%> of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols <S%G1494><s%>, we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> an idol <S%G1497><s%> is nothing <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there is none <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G1512><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> those that are called <S%G3004><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, (as <S%G5618><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> lords <S%G2962><s%>,)

But <S%G235><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> there is but one <S%G1520><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the Father <S%G3962><s%>, of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> there is not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every man <S%G3956><s%> that knowledge <S%G1108><s%>: for <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> with conscience <S%G4893><s%> of the idol <S%G1497><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> this hour <S%G737><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> it as <S%G5613><s%> a thing offered unto an idol <S%G1494><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> is defiled <S%G3435><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> commends <S%G3936><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> we eat <S%G5315><s%>, are we the better <S%G4052><s%>; neither <S%G3777><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> we eat <S%G5315><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, are we the worse <S%G5302><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> take care <S%G991><s%> lest by any means <S%G3381><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> liberty <S%G1849><s%> of yours <S%G5216><s%> becomes <S%G1096><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G4348><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> that are weak <S%G770><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> sees <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> which have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> sit at food <S%G2621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the idol <S%G1493><s%>'s temple, shall <S%G3618><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> the conscience <S%G4893><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> which is <S%G5607><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> be emboldened <S%G3618><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%> <S%G99999><s%> those things which are offered to idols <S%G1494><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G4674><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> shall <S%G622><s%> the weak <S%G770><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> perish <S%G622><s%>, for <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> when you sin <S%G264><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wound <S%G5180><s%> their <S%G846><s%> weak <S%G770><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>, you sin <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1355><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> causes <S%G4624><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to stumble <S%G4624><s%>, I will eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G99999><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> flesh <S%G2907><s%> while <S%G1519><s%> the world stands <S%G165><s%>, lest <S%G3361><s%> I cause <S%G4624><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> stumble <S%G4624><s%>.
